mapper.insert: insert into clue_track_record(clue_id, user_id, subject, level, record, next_time, type, false_reason, create_time) values(#{clueId}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{level}, #{record}, #{nextTime}, #{type}, #{falseReason}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.subject, t1.level, t1.record, t1.next_time, t1.type, t1.false_reason, t1.create_time, t2.name as assign_name from clue_track_record t1 left join user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.id where clue_id = #{id}
